channel.title: Comments on: Friday Go Forward: Week 70

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: Glad to hear that my lesson learned is a relevant topic across the board! I know that I still have issues with it during games, but it was certainly a step forward to confront it and not let it bother me as much as it normally does. Hope you had a good weekend as well! PS. I would recommend you try posting on Life in 19x19 or the Reddit Baduk forum regarding heat maps. You might get a faster response that way!
item.content:encoded:
Glad to hear that my lesson learned is a relevant topic across the board! I know that I still have issues with it during games, but it was certainly a step forward to confront it and not let it bother me as much as it normally does.
Hope you had a good weekend as well!
PS. I would recommend you try posting on Life in 19×19 or the Reddit Baduk forum regarding heat maps. You might get a faster response that way!

item.title: By: MolokaiCowboy
item.dc:creator: MolokaiCowboy
item.description: The 'Lesson Learned' here I think is huge, Ben. At least coming from the amateur chess world I can tell you that players 'psyching themselves out' is very, very common. It is one thing to play or evaluate by instinct (usually OK) and another thing to ride an emotional roller coaster during a game (always not OK). This is not really on topic (sorry) but perhaps Ben or someone knows: I saw a website some time back with Go 'heatmaps.' I thought it was an intriguing idea. But now I cannot find it. :( Anyone? I hope your weekend is good, Ben.
item.content:encoded:
The ‘Lesson Learned’ here I think is huge, Ben. At least coming from the amateur chess world I can tell you that players ‘psyching themselves out’ is very, very common. It is one thing to play or evaluate by instinct (usually OK) and another thing to ride an emotional roller coaster during a game (always not OK).
This is not really on topic (sorry) but perhaps Ben or someone knows: I saw a website some time back with Go ‘heatmaps.’ I thought it was an intriguing idea. But now I cannot find it. üôÅ Anyone?
I hope your weekend is good, Ben.
